userDefaultsTab.preselectProjectIssueType: Preselect last used project and issuetype
userDefaultsTab.showServiceDeksPortalFields: Show tab 'Portal Fields' for Jira Service Desk projects
userDefaultsTab.createIssueSuccessScreenEnabled: Show success screen after creating an issue
userDefaultsTab.oldEditor: Disable WYSIWYG Editor and use markup instead
userDefaultsTab.userDefaultsDescription: Configure the settings a new user will get by default when first installing our Outlook Add-In. This will only affect new users when adding this Jira instance as their first instance. Each user can then adjust these settings for his personal preferences.

technicalSettingsTab.remoteDebug: Allow Recording of the screen for debug purposes. This always has to be activated manually by the user and only lasts for a single session.
technicalSettingsTab.technicalSettingsDescription: Configure the settings for any user connecting our Outlook Add-In to this instance. This will affect all users after a few reloads of our Outlook Add-In.
technicalSettingsTab.privacyDescription: Disabling these options will severely impact our troubleshooting capabilities.
technicalSettingsTab.performanceDescription: Disabling these options might reduce the request load on your Jira instance.

emptyState.noAdminEmptyState: You need admin permissions to view this page

graphLoginScreen.header: Welcome to Outlook Email for Jira
graphLoginScreen.description: Looks like you are using this feature for the very first time. Please login with your Office 365 account to get started!

sharePermissionType.public: Everybody with access to this issue
sharePermissionType.azureTenant: Everybody in my company with access to this issue
sharePermissionType.heading: Who should be able to see this?

shareObjectTypeSettings.heading: What do you want to share?

conversationScreen.noMailEmptyStateWithLoginHint: This issue has no related emails you are allowed to see. There might be private mails here. You might see more if you login with Microsoft.
conversationScreen.noMailEmptyState: This issue has no related emails or none you are allowed to see.
